channel.title: Flawlscape 562 server great pking spawn server with friendly staff and people!
channel.description:
Hello flawlscape is a great server and I hope you will join.
I don`t want to write a page about it but I want to briefly tell you why its a good server. When you join have 2000m of barrows sets, rune sets, iron sets and more. You have tabs for example the Mage set which you can get. The download link is http://uppit.com/80vmljgpm335/FlawlScape_Client_V4_Update_2.1.rar
The webclient link is http://flawlscape.com/client.html
We have a forum and there are weekly pk tournaments for prizes. If you need help IG pm me Dclawed or ask people for help.
All prayers work and you can vote by ::vote and the reward ::reward you get 100,000 gp and 1 vote point which you can spend in shop, save up for lava items like the lava h`ween mask.
Thanks -Dclawed-

Hello flawlscape is a great server and I hope you will join.

I don`t want to write a page about it but I want to briefly tell you why its a good server.
When you join have 2000m of barrows sets, rune sets, iron sets and more.

All prayers work and you can vote by ::vote and the reward ::reward you get 100,000 gp and 1 vote point which you can spend in shop, save up for lava items like the lava h`ween mask.
